short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This narrows down the conditions of online services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Conditions of Privacy allows you to dynamically analyse the texts of online terms and conditions. The browser extension searches for the key terms "we can", "we collect", "we may", "we use" and "we will". These key terms often indicate the beginning of an important statement made in the texts. The extension counts up the occurences of the key terms in the text, and hyperlinks them, allowing you to click on points in the terms and conditions. Applies to any online policy written in English. For more information, visit http://conditionsofprivacy.net/ .
